sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { products } from "./products"; function ProductsGrid(props) { const [allproducts, setProduct] = useState(products); //console.log(allproducts); const filterProducts = (type, value) => { // console.log(value); if (type == 'category') { console.log(value); const result = products.filter((product) => { return product.product_cat_id === value; }); setProduct(result); } else { console.log(value); const result = products.filter((product) => { switch (product.mrp) { case product.mrp <= 50: return product.mrp <= 50 && product.mrp >= 20; break; case product.mrp >= 51: return product.mrp <= 100 && product.mrp >= 51; break; case product.mrp >= 101: return product.mrp <= 350 && product.mrp >- 101; break; default: return product; } }); setProduct(result); } } return (

Categories

  • { filterProducts('category', 'boy'); }}>Boys
  • { filterProducts('category', 't-shirt'); }}>T-shirts
  • { filterProducts('category', 'men'); }}>Men's
  • { filterProducts('category', 'women'); }}>accessories
  • { filterProducts('category', 'girl'); }}>Girls
  • { setProduct(products); }}>All

) } export default ProductsGrid;
